# CGImageSourceStatus

**Enumeration**

The set of status values for images and image sources.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CGImageSourceStatus
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.imageio/documentation/ImageIO/CGImageSourceGetStatus(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.imageio/documentation/ImageIO/CGImageSourceGetStatusAtIndex(_:_:)] functions return these values.

## Status Values

- **CGImageSourceStatus.statusUnexpectedEOF**: The end of the file occurred unexpectedly.
- **CGImageSourceStatus.statusInvalidData**: The data is not valid.
- **CGImageSourceStatus.statusUnknownType**: The image is an unknown type.
- **CGImageSourceStatus.statusReadingHeader**: The image source is reading the header.
- **CGImageSourceStatus.statusIncomplete**: The operation is not complete
- **CGImageSourceStatus.statusComplete**: The operation is complete.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Getting the Image Status

- **CGImageSourceGetStatus(_:)**: Return the status of an image source.
- **CGImageSourceGetStatusAtIndex(_:_:)**: Returns the current status of an image at the specified location in the image source.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
